Content.Title: Website Ping Tool
Content.SubTitle: PY100
Content.Content: A simple tool to ping the websites and get back the responses

Content.Title: Geocoder & Elevation from Google Maps
Content.SubTitle: ARCPY100
Content.Content: The tool is designed to obtain elevation , Geocoder information for the given places in a .CSV file from google maps web services and create corresponding features in ArcGIS.

Content.Title: Extending ArcGIS Desktop's Web Services functionality
Content.SubTitle: ARCPY101
Content.Content: The tool is primarily used to leverage ArcPy module and create web services that could be consumed via XMLHttp request or AJAX calls.

Content.Title: Network creator
Content.SubTitle: ARCPY102
Content.Content: The tool's functionality is to create network with the given point data (in excel file). It is basically used to create electrical network for the given High Tension lines in a sequential basis.

Content.Title: Realtime Data Viewer
Content.SubTitle: JSAPI100
Content.Content: Extended from the Configurable Map Viewer Project, this viewer is used to consume real time spatial data [ in JSON format ] and display them.

Content.Title: Map Viewer for ShapeFiles
Content.SubTitle: JSAPI101
Content.Content: Extended from the Configurable Map Viewer Project, this viewer is used to display shapefiles by leveraging ArcGIS Server's Feature generation request , thereby evading the dependencies on any custom ArcGIS server's REST services.

Content.Title: Google Maps Viewer
Content.SubTitle: GMAPS100
Content.Content: Viewer for Google Maps. [ In the process of making it completely configurable  :) ]
